settings.custom_liquid: Running Low - Order Now

settings.content: Support your horse in times of high stress such as travel, dietary changes, environmental changes, extreme weather, stall confinement, illness, intense exercise and competition.

settings.heading: Product Description
settings.content:
Stress Paste is a short term, fast-acting digestive supplement available in a convenient, palatable paste as a syringe or in a 360ml pouch. It’s designed for use before, during, and after stressful events such as travel, weather, competition, or sudden changes in routine.

Stress can cause horses to stop eating and drinking, tire quickly, and experience GI imbalance, dehydration, and muscle strain.

Stress Paste helps break this cycle by supporting normal stomach pH, microbial resiliency, hydration and nervous system function when it's needed most. By easing the effects of stress, it promotes calmer behaviour, consistent appetite, normal manure, and optimal performance.

Always consult your veterinarian or equine nutritionist for specific advice for your horse. Stress Paste is competition safe.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: Saccharomyces cerevisiae pre & postbiotics, magnesium hydroxide, vitamin premix with natural Vitamin E, natural betaine, threonine, pectin, glutamine, proline, serine.

settings.heading: How To Use
settings.content:
Feed StressPaste to your horses feed up to 30 minutes before the stress event then again 4-12 hours later, up to 3 times daily.

Max daily limit:

  • Horses up to 400kg: 1 serving is 30ml, up to 90ml daily.
  • Horses over 400kg: 1 serving is 60ml, up to 180ml daily.

settings.heading: Auto-Ship & Save
settings.content:
With Auto-Ship, you never have to worry about running out of StressPaste when you need it most.

You’ll receive your chosen quantity of StressPaste at your chosen frequency.

You’ll also save 10% on the price with every single delivery. Those savings add up, especially if you have multiple horses. You can cancel or edit your subscription at any time.

settings.text_k64VTB74sOswEtCJ: Stress is unavoidable, but your horse deserves peace.
settings.text_J6ybR73y9AFUZpLL: Whether it's travel, competition, or a sudden change in routine,  StressPaste is designed to provide rapid, targeted support - helping your horse stay calm, focused, and physically balanced in high-pressure situations.

settings.text_fsVD0S91TQAZHMtJ:
Developed by veterinarians and equine health experts, StressPaste combines advanced gut support with key ingredients that regulate stress hormones, promote relaxation, and protect the gastrointestinal tract.

Our formula is built on cutting-edge research into equine gut health and stress response. Each ingredient plays a crucial role in maintaining a horse’s mental and physical wellbeing.
settings.text_NvaIHOoMcha9VDtm: Supports beneficial gut bacteria during travel stress and reduced fibre intake from time off feed.
settings.text_HxNJZO6rCEr6PNXH: Acts as a stomach buffer to help prevent ulcers and provides magnesium, which is needed in higher amounts during stress.
settings.text_4TJymFAnAM3CxaLD: Helps maintain hydration and supports gut health during heat and exercise-related stress.
settings.text_BfWFQnCLGQeBlgFh: Essential for appetite, energy production, and nervous system support during stressful periods.
settings.text_F45fMOfFH6ZfcnBr:
Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant that protects muscles from oxidative stress caused by exercise and stress.

Vitamin C works with Vitamin E to combat free radicals. Supplementation supports optimal levels when natural production drops during stress.
settings.text_dbTrqe6awDNOvrYP: Coats the stomach lining to protect against acid splash and also supports good gut bacteria.
settings.text_aWklWBI5y7FgM6IL: Threonine, glutamine, proline, and serine aid gut lining repair and mucus production, promoting gut health during stress or time off feed.

settings.text_629tHMX1tE4ZdPSI: 1 full serving the night before travel helps prepare the gut and support hydration.
settings.text_XiGDodAu4S2dYRsZ: 1 serving 30 min before loading. If your horse is an anxious traveler, give StressPaste earlier, 60 minutes prior to loading
settings.text_lVPgkV9TmxQ5SZUo: For trips over 4 hours, give an additional half serving every 4 hours.
settings.text_slIYIa5xkDJ4GHI7: After travel, give a final full serving if the trip was over 4 hours to encourage eating and drinking.

settings.text_hrbmSeupZZzW40un: StressPaste aids gut health, hydration, and muscle recovery to ease acute stress symptoms, keeping horses calm, focused, and responsive without sedation.

settings.text_ykaAJbj7wbITXIkE: Don't just take our word for it. Hear it from our regular customers.

settings.text_sJyldNP01rSH3Y9i: Real and honest reviews from horse owners. These results reflect the unique experiences of real customers. These observations are not intended to replace advice from your veterinarian and are not guaranteed.

settings.text_W356wZvsuIFkpLJg:
Stress affects horses in many ways while some signs can be subtle, more obvious ones include anxious behaviour. They stop eating. They stop drinking. Muscles tire faster, dehydration sets in, and energy levels drop.

Time off feed and heat stress throw gut health off balance, while oxidative stress strains muscles and organs. Anxiety kicks in, fueling the cycle. They stop eating. They stop drinking… and it continues.

Reducing stress isn’t just beneficial—it’s essential for your horse’s overall well-being, performance, and longevity. By making proactive choices, you can create a calmer, healthier environment that helps your horse thrive.

Stress Paste helps break this cycle, keeping horses eating, drinking, and feeling their best by supporting hydration, gut health, and muscle function when they need it most. Use Stress Paste before, during and after a stress event. For best results we recommend using it with our daily, foundation gut support, Digestive HP
settings.text_WwsPGCkW41uUxQkZ: No, Stress Paste does not sedate your horse.  Stress Paste works by supporting the functions affected most by stressful events. By supporting gut health, hydration, and muscle recovery, Stress Paste helps horses stay comfortable, focused, and calm without dulling their responses.
settings.text_w3mupjPhKox4mVsc: Stress Paste provides buffering support from magnesium hydroxide and pectin for approximately 4 hours. If you give two doses within 24 hours, the remaining ingredients will continue working throughout that period. For optimal long-term hindgut support, we recommend using DigestiveHP alongside Stress Paste.
settings.text_bo8gg88XqoJSYdC6: When should I use StressPaste for competition and exercise?
settings.text_WP1bIcJRkLtHw2L3:
Stress Paste is best used multiple times to help manage stress and maintain hydration before, during, and after competition.

Here’s the recommended protocol:

  • 1 full serve the night before competition – to prepare the gut and support hydration.

  • 1 full serve 30 minutes to an hour before the competitive event - to help maintain focus and gut comfort.

  • 1 full serve the night after the competition - to support recovery and appetite

  • For multi-day events, you can provide ½ serve 2-3 times daily and can be timed 30 to 60 minutes before competition timing.

  • Finally, if your horse isn’t eating or drinking – give a full serve to encourage appetite and hydration.

The serving size is 60 ml for horses over 400kg or 30 ml for horses under 400kg. This routine ensures your horse stays comfortable, performs at their best, and recovers well after competition.
settings.text_sq72brEpdd0FfAff:
While you may see similar benefits with these products, their intended usage is what makes DigestiveHP and StressPaste fundamentally different.

DigestiveHP is the daily gut-health supplement that supports your horse through their day-to-day stressors, to keep them healthy, happy and performing at their best.

Stress Paste plays best in instances of acute stress, designed to deliver immediate gut and nervous system support in the face of high impact events including competition, travel and extreme weather. StressPaste is also recommended when first starting DigestiveHP to provide that extra buffer support at the very beginning.

Conveniently formulated in a concentrated paste, Stress Paste is easy to give ahead of known or predicted stressful events.
settings.text_kYwwSi4bPqLOeQUq: Can I use more than 1 tube per day?
settings.text_Gnnk9UI3MLGW7f3F: Yes, you can use more than one tube of StressPaste per day in situations like prolonged travel, competition,  illness, ulcer treatment, extreme weather, or endurance events. In extreme cases, use up to 1.5 tubes per day for horses under 400kg and up to 3 tubes per day for horses weighing above 400kg. (This serving rate should not exceed two consecutive weeks.)
settings.text_tQgk2AwwObTmVIzj: How many days in a row can I use StressPaste?
settings.text_CWxHxZNEqFFvMIA0: Stress Paste can be used daily during periods of acute stress, such as travel, competition, illness, or recovery. If used for more than five days, it’s best to taper off gradually by reducing to a half dose for two days, then a quarter dose for four days to allow your horse’s natural vitamin C production to normalize.
settings.text_XWR3DCCt3kvENIV6: Can it be used for foals and weanlings?
settings.text_PRIerWH0l4QX4nQ9: Yes! Use ¼ dose for foals and ½ dose for weanlings. The recommended serving size is 60 ml for horses over 400kg and 30 ml for horses under 400kg.
settings.text_cTIrQhoKIIUdSl39: No, for one-off use, the full serve should be given at once to achieve maximum effect. Splitting the dose is not necessary in these situations.
